description: This Java source file defines a Spring Boot REST controller named HelloController, which provides basic endpoints for health checks, documentation redirects, and application info for the notes-backend service.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: REST controller providing basic endpoints for metadata, health, and documentation redirect.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Handles GET requests at '/' and returns a welcome message.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Handles GET requests at '/docs' and redirects to Swagger UI documentation.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Handles GET requests at '/health' and returns application health status.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Handles GET requests at '/api/info' and returns application information.
